tender.title: LPMAT00109GX
tender.description:
S1 Bush Clearing Horticulture (2 months) - ESKOM Matimba Power Station intends to enter into an agreement, with a suitably qualified, experienced and established supplier with the capacity to deliver Bush Clearing, cutting of trees and fire breaks services on S1 belt at Matimba Power Station.
This is an all-inclusive horticulture service including the provision of all equipment, manpower, consumables, and the disposal of all the waste generated at the Ash Dump.
